text: eyata ovun (tigæssi) “ættenma oba yusuf vasayen sitinnehida?”yi vimasuha. eyata ohu “mamayi yusuf. mohu mage sahodarayaya. niyata vasayenma allah apa kerehi imahat varaprasadayan pahala kara ætteya. mandayat niyata vasayenma kavurun parisuddhavantayeku vasayen sitimin (duk gæhætada) vinda dara gannoda, (evæni) honda dæya karannange phalavipaka niyata vasayenma allah apate harinne næta” yayi pævasuveya
